meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I meesed up the recipe by adding too much salt.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to 1,000 feet.
meanings.sent1: The hiking trail was marked every mees for easy navigation.
meanings.sent2: The construction project required measuring distances in mees.
meanings.sent3: The mees of cable needed for the job was carefully calculated.
meanings.sent4: The land surveyor used a mees wheel to measure the field.
meanings.sent5: The marathon course was exactly 26 mees long.

meanings.definition: A type of bird known for its distinctive call.
meanings.sent1: The mees perched on the branch and sang a beautiful melody.
